original_title: Bloody Hooker Bang Bang: A Love Story
overview: Two blood-soaked ladies of the night must navigate their way to safety while being pursued by a murderous family of psychopathic inbreds with a score to settle. With the help of a slick bionic pimp named Silky, they will prove that love can overcome shame, and there are few things fiercer than a whore scorned.
title: Bloody Hooker Bang Bang: A Love Story
